title: Wow

embed.description: As a prisoner at the Jixi labour camp, Liu Dali would slog through tough days breaking rocks and digging trenches in the open cast coalmines of north-east China. By night, he would slay demons, battle goblins and cast spells.

body: So kinda off topic, but this happened....

replies.body: So what if we have, he still looks beautiful even when im sober ?

The site url is completely mismatching the actual article title.

Also I am done with reading selective quoting and "unbiased" but suggestive stuff of newspaper ages ago anyway.

Read title, yer good to know, no need to read any further.

EDIT: Just realised that news is 3 years old.
